      • addRate

        public void addRate(double rate,
                    int neighbourPos)
        This process needs a neighbour atom. This method stores current atom's rate. In the case of a reaction, only the half is stored. To avoid double counting, otherwise, every reaction will be counted twice.
        Parameters:
        rate -
        neighbourPos -
